name: Metal Muslim
description: For those who have an acquired taste of music you grew up with, this is for you.

name:
Keep Calm And Speak The Truth
(Royal Blue)
description: Water based tonal ink on 100% combed cotton tee. Water based ink prints an incredibly soft, smooth, breathable image which literally can not be felt on the shirt after initial wash. Featuring Wear The Truth custom tag.

name:
Keep Calm And Speak The Truth
(Kelly Green)
description: Water based tonal ink on 100% combed cotton tee. Water based ink prints an incredibly soft, smooth, breathable image which literally can not be felt on the shirt after initial wash. Featuring Wear The Truth custom tag.

name: The Messengers (Black)
description:
The Messengers Abraham, Moses, Jesus and Muhammad, peace be upon them, are the leaders of the true Monolithic religion who came with the same single message of peace and unity. The perfect t-shirt for our Jew, Christian and Muslim friends.

Typeset in white Helvetica Neue on black.

name: The Messengers (Heather Grey)
description:
The Messengers Abraham, Moses, Jesus and Muhammad, peace be upon them, are the leaders of the true Monolithic religion who came with the same single message of peace and unity. The perfect t-shirt for our Jew, Christian and Muslim friends.

Typeset in white Helvetica Neue on heather grey.

name: A for Adam (Kids)
description:
A is for Adam (peace be upon him), the first prophet and man on earth. This t-shirt is specially designed for kids.

Please note that sizes are American standard. You are highly recommended to view the sizing chart below before making any purchase.

http://www.americanapparel.net/sizing/default.asp?chart=kids.topsM

name: The Blessed Sandals (Olive)
description:
An illustration of the blessed sandal, embedded on a mirror image calligraphy of 'Muhammad'. The Prophet’s (peace be upon him) sandal is an amulet full of bliss, peace and serenity.  White on olive.

Every tee is accompanied by a complimentary Na'al pin courtesy of Rumi's Door, an Islamic clothing and accessory shop (limited to the first 40 tees only).

name: The Blessed Sandals (Black)
description:
An illustration of the blessed sandal, embedded on a mirror image calligraphy of 'Muhammad'. The Prophet’s (peace be upon him) sandal is an amulet full of bliss, peace and serenity.  White on jet black.

Every tee is accompanied by a complimentary Na'al pin courtesy of Rumi's Door, an Islamic clothing and accessory shop (limited to the first 40 tees only).

name: Coexist
description:
The Muslim crescent and the star of David (or seal of Solomon). A new symbol of acceptance and universal unity is born.

Green on White.

name: Defender of Truth
description: Defend the beauty of Islam. Classic black logo on creme.

name: His Whirling Dervish
description:
A tradition of Divine connection passed by Sayyidina Abu Bakr (r.a.), through to 13th century Sufi Master Jalaluddin Rumi and practised throughout Sufi orders today.

Black whirling dervish on passion red.

name: Ya Hu
description:
Ya Hu ('O He!') in Arabic calligraphy.

Metallic gold on jet black.

Be blessed everywhere you go. 786 is the numerical value of the Arabic phrase, Bismillahir-Rahmanir-Rahim.

Yellow overlay lime green on White.

name: Official Rakin Niass (Limited Edition)
description:
The official Rakin Niass. Exclusively designed for Rakin Niass for his album 'The Road Less Travelled'. White on jet black. 100% super soft ringspun cotton. Custom tag.

Rakin Niass

Rakin's brand of conscious hip hop is inspired by the sayings of Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon him) and Malcolm X, amongst others. His music contains messages of peace and harmony targeted at the urban youth. Coupled with deep bass and upbeat tempo, there are both soothing and upbeat moments in his music. Listen to Rakin Niass latest album 'The Road Less Travelled' at http://rakinniass.bandcamp.com
